title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Workshop on Inclusive Science Education Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can interpret learning analytics data to identify at least three participation barriers for marginalized learners
Learners can apply at least two inclusive strategies when designing PBL (Problem-Based Learning) activities based on learning analytics
Learners can evaluate educational effectiveness using data collection and visualization techniques executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
